# bin-string
Outputs the shortest string permutations of 3-digit binaries

# Description
Generates the shortest possible list of binary digits, that contain every combination of lenght 3

1.Example of 3-digit binaries: 
> (000, 001, 010, 011, 100, 101, 110, 111)

# Usage
> python genbinstring.py

# Output

> 00010111
00011101
00100111
00101110
00111001
00111010
01000111
01001011
01001101
01001110
01010011
01011001
01011100
01100011
01100101
01101001
01110001
01110010
01110100
10001011
10001101
10001110
10010110
10011010
10011100
10100011
10100110
10101100
10110001
10110010
10110100
10111000
11000101
11000110
11010001
11011000
11100010
11101000
